items.sentence: I\'ve heard that Tom can cook as well as, or better than, his wife.
Tom bought a newspaper and read it on the train on the way to work.
Tom bought some mosquito nets made in China to give to his friends.
Tom could tell by the way Mary slammed the door that she was upset.
I thought he was an American but he turned out to be an Englishman.
It seems like you got up on the wrong side of the bed this morning.
It would mean a lot to Tom if you helped him learn a little French.
There are many more students in the classroom today than yesterday.
These days it is not a good idea to hitchhike. It can be dangerous.
Tom and his friends sat on the beach and watched the boys swimming.
